pkgmetadata.longdescription: This cube models cards that are like wiki pages.`Card` entities have a title, an abstract and some textual content as text, restor html.To create a new card, just create a link like '/card/YOUR_WIKI_ID' and follow itin your browser. Such a link can be written using the native HTML editor(fckeditor) or the dedicated restructured text "card" directive, as follows :: :card:`free_software/logilab:free software at Logilab`
